summary.span: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.

span.span: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于操作中的边距宽度和。The class is used to manipulate the width of margins in and . 是此类的类型描述符。 is the type descriptor for this class. ， ，和是定义边距的属性。, , , and are properties that define the margins. 创建一个相同。 creates an identical . 确定另一个对象是否具有相同的尺寸。 determines if another object has the same dimensions as a . 打印有关的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下面的代码示例将设置默认值为文档的页设置为 1 英寸的边距每一侧。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins of 1 inch on each side. summary.span: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

span.span: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

value.span: 下边距中百分之一英寸。

span.span: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在测量以毫米为单位的边距，multiply 边距宽度要以毫米为单位乘以 3.937 确定英寸百分之一的正确度量单位。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 例如，如果你想 25 毫米的边距，multiply 乘以 3.937，结果是 98 时向下舍入。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down. 然后，您设置相应成员设置为 98。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下面的代码示例将文档的默认页设置设置为左边距和右边距为 1 英寸宽度和顶部和底部边距为 1.5 英寸的宽度。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width. [!code-cpp[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Margins.Left Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Margins.Left Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在测量以毫米为单位的边距，multiply 边距宽度要以毫米为单位乘以 3.937 确定英寸百分之一的正确度量单位。If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch. 例如，如果你想 25 毫米的边距，multiply 乘以 3.937，结果是 98 向下舍入。For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 rounded down. 然后，您设置相应成员设置为 98。You would then set the appropriate member to 98. ## Examples 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. 下面的代码示例将文档的默认页设置设置为左边距和右边距为 1 英寸宽度和顶部和底部边距为 1.5 英寸的宽度。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to left and right margins of 1 inch in width, and top and bottom margins of 1.5 inches in width.
